name: jennifer eib
text: Gets worse everytime I order!!! Ordered a taco pizza. Very little lettuce or tomatoes but covered in onions. When it finally got to me more than 30 mins after it left the store it was cold. It's pretty bad when you have to heat a pizza that was just delivered to your door. Wont be spending my money here again.

name: Nick Taylor
text: Absolute worst Pizza Hut in Grant County. Management here has ran this business into the ground over the last 10 years. If it werent for good Pizza Hut locations elsewhere I would outright boycott Pizza Hut as a whole because of this local â€¦More

name: Mr. Wiley
text: We walk in and the lady immediately stops us and says we have an hour and half wait. The lobby was 1/3 full - she said they couldn't keep up with all the orders coming in. Delivery and carrying is priority first. This is terrible customer service for a Friday night

name: Debbi Secrest
text: Worst Hawaiian pizza I have ever had! Canadian bacon or ham (not sure which it was) was like chewing leather, crust was dried out and had to search for BBQ sauce.  My 13 yr old and 6 yr old granddaughters even said it wasn't very good. Really doesn't even deserve the 1 star I gave it.

name: William Stringer
text: The folks here were super nice. After a college visit, my daughter and I were starving. We stopped in before our three hour drive to order a pizza. It was piping hot and created to our specifications. Like the commercial says, "when you are looking for a place to pick up a pizza, might we recommend a place with pizza in the name?"

text: Well 6 months ago i posted how bad the food was at this location, it wasnt just one visit but over the course of a year or so, now the last couple months we just decided give it another chance by hearing how this location has really did a 180, let me tell ya way better than before, we are customers again,  keep up the good work all

name: Donna Weis
text: Ours was a party of 10 and we ordered pizza, breadsticks, pasta, wings, salad bar, beer and sodas, and we received everything correctly, timely and tasty. Our waitress was neat and friendly and she checked occasionally for refills, etc. We all left satisfied and full.

name: Sam
text: ORDERED PIZZA FROM HERE, IT WAS HARD AS A ROCK AND TASTED HORRIBLE. I HAD 4 KIDS I WAS FEEDING AND HAD TO SPEND EXTRA MONEY BECAUSE OF HOW BAD OUR PIZZA WAS. NO ONE SEEMED TO CARE ABOUT FIXING IT. I'M NOT LIKELY TO GO BACK HERE ANYTIME SOON, IF AT ALL...

name: Konrad Willmert
